survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Hybrid Meeting Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employee satisfaction and preferences regarding the tools used for hybrid meetings (combining in-person and remote participants).

questions.question_text: Which hybrid meeting tools does your organization currently use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to capture all tools in use. Consider adding an 'Other' option to identify any niche platforms.
